title: Cafe Yumm - Broadway
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Quick service restaurant chain in Pacific Northwest. Offers bowls, sandwiches, salads, wraps, and breakfast; has tempeh and tofu. Signature dish is Yumm bowl which comes with choice of brown or jasmine rice, beans, and topped with sauce, salsa, veggies, and dairy - ask to make your bowl vegan, and kitchen will substitute cheese/cream for avocado or veggies.
